properties.entry: SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'realmaster' AND TABLE_NAME = ?;
Select id, username, name, email, mobile_no, status FROM mst_user;
Select id, lastname, firstname, initial, email, mobileno, telno, address1 as address, status FROM mst_renter WHERE lastname = ? AND firstname = ? AND initial = ?
Select id, username, name, email, mobile_no, status FROM mst_user where id = ?;
INSERT INTO realmaster.tx_rental (aptId, roomId, dueDate, txDate, startDate, endDate, deposit, renterId, balance, txType, provider, amount, status, userId) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);
SELECT id, name, personIncharge, aptType, mobileNo, telNo, address1, address2, status FROM realmaster.mst_apartment;
SELECT id, aptId, floor, roomNo, roomType, size, occupied, telNo, rate, status FROM realmaster.mst_room WHERE aptId = ?

SELECT renter.id, renter.firstname, renter.lastname, renter.initial, renter.email, renter.mobileno, renter.address1, renter.telNo, renter.address2, renter.status FROM realmaster.mst_renter as renter LEFT JOIN realmaster.tx_rental as rent ON renter.id = rent.renterId WHERE rent.status = 'active';

SELECT renter.id, rent.aptId, rent.roomId, rent.txType as rentType, rent.roomId, rent.dueDate, rent.startDate, rent.endDate, rent.deposit, rent.balance, rent.txType, rent.id as txId, rent.amount, apt.name as aptName, room.roomNo as roomName, room.rate as roomRate FROM realmaster.mst_renter as renter LEFT JOIN realmaster.tx_rental as rent ON renter.id = rent.renterId LEFT JOIN realmaster.mst_apartment as apt ON rent.aptId = apt.id LEFT JOIN realmaster.mst_room as room ON rent.roomId = room.id WHERE renter.id = ? and rent.status = 'active';
SELECT id, aptId, roomId, dueDate, txDate, startDate, endDate, renterId, balance, txType, status, amount FROM realmaster.tx_rental WHERE renterId = ?
INSERT INTO realmaster.tx_collections (txId, renterId, roomId, aptId, amountPaid, balance, deposit, txDate, userId, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
